title: Social Constructivist Learning Design Workshop Based on xMOOC

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Courses for preservice/in-service teachers to strengthen specialized competencies in social studies subject areas

learning_goals: Learners execute social learning activities (e.g., collaborative discussions, peer assessments) on xMOOC platforms with over 80% participation.
Learners apply at least three learning design frameworks based on social constructivist theory to real-world educational scenarios.
Learners build and lead a knowledge-sharing community among peers using social tools within an LMS, with at least five instances of active participation.

resources: LMS Platform (Integrated Discussion Board, Wiki, Collaboration Tools)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
